meanings.definition: The act of administering something jointly or in conjunction with others.
meanings.sent1: The coadministrations of the project were successful due to teamwork.
meanings.sent2: The doctors discussed the coadministrations of the patient's treatment plan.
meanings.sent3: The coadministrations of the surprise party made it a memorable event.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership skills were evident in the smooth coadministrations of the group project.
meanings.sent5: The coadministrations of resources among the team ensured efficiency.

meanings.definition: The simultaneous administration of multiple substances or medications.
meanings.sent1: The coadministrations of different medications can sometimes lead to unexpected side effects.
meanings.sent2: The hospital staff carefully monitored the coadministrations of the patient's prescriptions.
meanings.sent3: The coadministrations of flavors in the recipe created a unique taste.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, the coadministrations of various instruments produce beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent5: The coadministrations of ingredients in the skincare product resulted in a powerful formula.
